com.giift.sdk.data

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.giift.sdk.data.Card
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.provider.BaseColumns

    public abstract class Card
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.provider.BaseColumns
    Data model representation of a card (gift card, loyalty card, ...). A card is always attached to a Dmo and most of time attached to a User.

                                                          java.lang.String dmoId)
        Get the uri of the cards attached to a dmo.

        Returns:

        See Also:
        {@link com.giift.sdk.data.GiiftProvider}

      • IsDeletable

        public static boolean IsDeletable(@NonNull
                                  android.database.Cursor c)
        Check if the card behind this cursor is deletable or not. RCARD and UCARD which have a non-null value cannot be deleted. The Universal loyalty program cannot be deleted.
        Parameters:
        c - cursor, which should contain Dmo.COLUMN_TYPE, Card.COLUMN_DMO and Card.COLUMN_VALUE
        Returns:
        true if the card can be deleted. This allow to display a delete button.

      • RevokeCard

        public static boolean RevokeCard(@NonNull
                                 android.content.Context context,
                                 @NonNull
                                 java.lang.String cardId)
        Change the status of a card in the GiiftProvider
        Parameters:
        context - used to access to the database
        cardId - card to be deleted
        Returns:
        true if the card was properly updated

      • UpdateFromJson

        @Nullable
public static android.net.Uri UpdateFromJson(@NonNull
                                                       android.content.Context context,
                                                       @NonNull
                                                       org.json.JSONObject cardObj)
        Read a card from its JSON representation and update it in the GiiftProvider if necessary. To be inserted a Card needs to have an id.
        Parameters:
        context - used to access to the database
        cardObj - json representation of the card
        Returns:
        uri of the card used to access it through the GiiftProvider

      • UpdateFromJsonPos

        @Nullable
public static android.net.Uri UpdateFromJsonPos(@NonNull
                                                          android.content.Context context,
                                                          @NonNull
                                                          org.json.JSONObject cardObj)
        Read a card from its JSON representation and update it in the GiiftProvider if necessary. To be inserted a Card needs to have an id. In Pos if card id is present update it since card with same id but different number can be requested
        Parameters:
        context - used to access to the database
        cardObj - json representation of the card
        Returns:
        uri of the card used to access it through the GiiftProvider

      • Json2ContentValues

        public static android.content.ContentValues Json2ContentValues(@NonNull
                                                               org.json.JSONObject obj)
        Read a json object representing a card and converts it into a ContentValues object ready to be inserted into the GiiftProvider
        Parameters:
        obj - card representation
        Returns:
        ContentValues object ready to be inserted in a ContentProvider or in db directly

      • UpdateFromJsonV1

        public static android.net.Uri UpdateFromJsonV1(@NonNull
                                               android.content.Context context,
                                               @NonNull
                                               org.json.JSONObject cardObj)
        Read a json object representing a card and converts it into a ContentValues object ready to be inserted into the GiiftProvider
        Parameters:
        cardObj - card representation for api v1
        Returns:
        ContentValues object ready to be inserted in a ContentProvider or in db directly

      • UpdateFromJsonPosV1

        @Nullable
public static android.net.Uri UpdateFromJsonPosV1(@NonNull
                                                            android.content.Context context,
                                                            @NonNull
                                                            org.json.JSONObject cardObj)
        Read a card from its JSON representation and update it in the GiiftProvider if necessary. To be inserted a Card needs to have an id. In Pos if card id is present update it since card with same id but different number can be requested
        Parameters:
        context - used to access to the database
        cardObj - json representation of the card
        Returns:

      • CardUpdateValues

        public static android.content.ContentValues CardUpdateValues(@NonNull
                                                             java.lang.String cardId,
                                                             android.os.Bundle args)
        Read Bundle values for the card update and return content values to be updated in the db
        Parameters:
        cardId - id of the card
        args - contains the card params( Card.VALUE, Card.EXPIRY, Card.NUMBER, Card.PIN, Card.EXTRA_LOGIN, Card.EXTRA_PWD)
        Returns:
        JsonObject card

      • UpdateFromLocal

        @Nullable
public static android.net.Uri UpdateFromLocal(@NonNull
                                                        android.content.Context context,
                                                        @NonNull
                                                        android.content.ContentValues values)
        Update the db with the local card values . To be inserted a Card needs to have an id.
        Parameters:
        context - used to access to the database
        values - content values of the card
        Returns:
        uri of the card used to access it through the GiiftProvider
        See Also:
        CardUpdateValues(String, Bundle)
